channel.title: config on a2n-s' Personal Website & Blog
channel.description: Recent content in config on a2n-s' Personal Website & Blog

item.title: Config
item.description: Below, one can find every piece of my current config. the entire doc HERE. the doftiles (*) for my Arch setup. my wallpapers (*). my polybar (*). my dmenu rice (*). all the dmscripts (*) I use. my surf rice (*). my oh-my-bash fork (*). my oh-my-fish fork (*). my oh-my-zsh fork (*). my kitty fork (*). my tabbed rice (*). my slock rice (*). my neovim config (*). (*) means that the field comes from another place.
item.content:
Below, one can find every piece of my current config.

  • the entire doc HERE.
  • the doftiles (*) for my Arch setup.
  • my wallpapers (*).
  • my polybar (*).
  • my dmenu rice (*).
  • all the dmscripts (*) I use.
  • my surf rice (*).
  • my oh-my-bash fork (*).
  • my oh-my-fish fork (*).
  • my oh-my-zsh fork (*).
  • my kitty fork (*).
  • my tabbed rice (*).
  • my slock rice (*).
  • my neovim config (*).

(*) means that the field comes from another place. Clicking will redirect you there.

--------------------------------------------------------------------

Go back to the front page.

item.title: Config's Doc
item.description: This page allows the user to redirect to the different docs of my config, as the latter is composed of many different blocks. One can find information below: the dotfiles for my Arch setup. the scripts I use to make my life easier. my wallpapers. my polybar. my dmenu rice. all the dmscripts I use. my surf rice. my oh-my-bash fork. my oh-my-fish fork. my oh-my-zsh fork. my kitty fork.
item.content:
This page allows the user to redirect to the different docs of my config, as the latter is composed of many different blocks.
One can find information below:

  • the dotfiles for my Arch setup.
  • the scripts I use to make my life easier.
  • my wallpapers.
  • my polybar.
  • my dmenu rice.
  • all the dmscripts I use.
  • my surf rice.
  • my oh-my-bash fork.
  • my oh-my-fish fork.
  • my oh-my-zsh fork.
  • my kitty fork.
  • my tabbed rice.
  • my slock rice.
  • my neovim config.

--------------------------------------------------------------------

Go back to the doc or to the front page.
